text: 300px Tiger with a Tortoise or Tiger Playing with a Tortoise is an 1862 oil on canvas painting by Eugène Delacroix. It was sold by Christie's in New York for $ 9,875,000 in May 2018https://www.christies.com/features/Live-like-a- Rockefeller-Delacroix-Tiger-with- Tortoise-8842-1.aspxhttps://www.christies.com/lotfinder/Lot/eugene- delacroix-1798-1863-tigre-jouant-avec-une-6134201-details.aspx ==References== category:1862 paintings Category:Paintings by Eugène Delacroix Category:Tigers in art Category:Turtles in art
title: Tiger with a Tortoise
